net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.io
Class CommandMap

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.io.CommandMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
ButtonListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestCommandMap
public abstract class CommandMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements ButtonListener

Okay, this is a little weird, but this maps virtual button presses to command intentions. Something like if you press the virtual A-button, this interprets that as a confirm. However, in most games this only exists as a single blob and never changes. This is here so that multiple maps can be plug-and-played for testing purposes. A default implementation should be kicking around somewhere.

Also of note: these should be specific to a context, so the command map for menus shouldn't be the same as gameplay, etc.
